document_data.caption: Cover of ''Vanity's Brood''.
document_data.title: Vanity's Brood
document_data.author: [[Lisa Smedman]]
document_data.realm year: Summer, [[1374 DR]]<ref group="note">No date is given in the novel. In Chapter 1, it is stated to be six months after the events of ''Viper's Kiss'' and a year since ''Venom's Taste'' (dated to summer, 1373). It is also summer. This places it in the summer of 1374.
document_data.mainbody:
'''''Vanity's Brood''''' by [[Lisa Smedman]] was the final novel of the [[House of Serpents Trilogy]]. {{Quote|'''''[[Medusanna Mhairdaul|Medusanna]]'''''
''A [[priestess]] of terrifying power convinces the''
'''''[[Se'sehen]]'''''
''A [[yuan-ti]] tribe from the distant jungles of [[Chult]] to serve her growing cult of''
'''''[[Sseth]]'''''
''Merciless god of the serpent people who languishes in the foul plane of''
'''''[[Smaragh]]'''''
''Where a trapped and desperate [[Karell]] can only hope [[Arvin]] will find her before the''
'''''[[House Extaminos|House of Serpents]]'''''
''Finally destroys their last hope for freedom.''|Vanity's Brood}}
